label: Tech Enthusiast
description: Loves AI, coding, open-source tools, and staying up-to-date with the latest in tech.
sample_posts: Just shipped my new VSCode plugin!

Why Rust is the future of systems programming.

description: Passionate about trying new cuisines, sharing food pics, and dishing out restaurant recs.

Coffee tasting.

HIIT cardio + heavy squats activate!

label: Minimalist Artist
description: Shares aesthetic visuals, poetry, and abstract thoughts—less is more.

Monochrome moments speak volumes.
